TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VoiceChangeEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>時，會建立<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件引發<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>事件。 若要取得新的身分識別<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>，存取<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>事件處理常式中的屬性。
您可以變更使用中的語音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>與任何一<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>屬性會取得<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>物件時<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>就會引發事件。
